title: Speed in Relational DB Management Systems
text:
We often get confused when we donâ€™t know which databases to use.
In this study I compared the speed of processing of three of the most popular DBMS (SQLite, MySQL, PostgreSQL).
In this work I used and model with multiple factors: DBMS, Computer in which the experiment was performed, Query and Portions of the Data.
I found that DBMS PostgreSQL and SQLite handle text data faster than MySQL.
A more detailed description of my study in the next presentation:

title: Modeling Survival times in African countries using rstanarm
text:
In this study we used a Bayesian Approach to model survival times of the people in different African countries.
Firstly we collected and cleaned the data from the format provided by the Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS).
We used R and the package rstanarm to create the models.
More info about the study in the poster presented:
